title: Nikola Čelebić
text:
Nikola Čelebić (<a href="Cyrillic">Cyrillic</a>: Никола Челебић, born 4 July 1989) is a <a href="Montenegro">Montenegrin</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender playing with <a href="FK%20Podgorica">FK Podgorica</a> in the <a href="Montenegrin%20First%20League">Montenegrin First League</a>.
Club career.
Born in <a href="Titograd">Titograd</a>, <a href="SFR%20Yugoslavia">SFR Yugoslavia</a> (nowadays Podgorica, Montenegro), he played in the youth teams of <a href="FK%20Partizan">FK Partizan</a>. His first season as senior was with FK Sopot in the 2007-08 <a href="Serbian%20League%20Belgrade">Serbian League Belgrade</a>, third level league in Serbia.
In summer 2008 he moved back to Montenegro to play with <a href="FK%20Jedinstvo%20Bijelo%20Polje">FK Jedinstvo Bijelo Polje</a> in the <a href="Montenegrin%20First%20League">Montenegrin First League</a>. After that season, he will play in 2009–10 with <a href="FK%20Bratstvo%20Cijevna">FK Bratstvo Cijevna</a> before returning a year later to the Montenegrin top league, this time to play with <a href="OFK%20Petrovac">OFK Petrovac</a>.
In summer 2011 he was back in Serbia, this time to play with top-level club, <a href="FK%20BSK%20Bor%C4%8Da">FK BSK Borča</a>. He plays as a left-back.
International career.
He was part of the <a href="Montenegro%20national%20under-19%20football%20team">Montenegrin U19 national team</a>.
